rootpage_setupPage_InstitutesSelectionDe: This be th' easiest way. 'Tis a list where ye can search fer yer university, but not all institutes be here!
rootpage_setupPage_UrlLoginDescription: If ye can't find yer university in th' list, enter th' Neptun URL o' yer school t' login. This might not work wit' all universities!
rootpage_setupPage_AppProblemReporting:
Be thar a problem wit' th' app?
Tell me! 👉
instituteSelection_setupPage_InstituteCa: Can't find yer school in th' list?

Items in th' list above were added manually! 😅 It be possible that some institutes be missin' from it.
Ye can login via URL if ye can't find yer school. 😉
urlLogin_setupPage_InstituteNeptunUrlInv:
This be not a valid Neptun URL! 😡

Paste somethin' similar here:
https://neptun-ws01.uni-pannon.hu/hallgato/login.aspx 🤫
urlLogin_setupPage_WhereIsURLHelper: Where do I find th' URL?
urlLogin_setupPage_WhereIsURLHelperDescr:
Go t' yer school's Neptun website, and paste th' link from up top. 🔗

Ex: https://neptun-ws01.uni-pannon.hu/hallgato/login.aspx
loginPage_setupPage_2faWarning: If ye have multi factor authentication enabled on yer account, ye won't be able t' login!
loginPage_setupPage_2faWarningDescriptio:
❌ Neptun2 uses th' old Neptun mobile app API, which didn't contain multi factor authentication. If yer account be protected by it, ye won't be able t' login via Neptun2.

🤓 But ye can turn it off, and ye will be able t' use Neptun2 wit' no problem.
T' turn it off, go t' "My Data/Settings" in Neptun web.
loginPage_setupPage_LoginInProgressSlow: Neptun servers be havin' a hard time...
api_loadingScreenHintFriendly1_Universal: Yer phone would go up in flames if this were faster...
api_loadingScreenHintFriendly2_Universal: Still better than th' nonexistent Neptun mobile app...
api_loadingScreenHintFriendly4_Universal: Thar be a power outage at SDA informatics...
api_loadingScreenHintFriendly5_Universal: SDA informatics be an amazin' company...
api_loadingScreenHintFriendly6_Universal: Did ye know? "Neptun 2" were created in about 1 week...
api_loadingScreenHintFriendly7_Universal: Too slow? Send a complaint t' SDA informatics...
api_loadingScreenHint1_Universal: Th' Neptun servers be workin' as hard as an average hungarian construction worker...
api_loadingScreenHint2_Universal: We be waitin' until th' CEO o' SDA informatics drown in coffee...
api_loadingScreenHint3_Universal: Be patient, th' servers be down because a rat went into 'em...
api_loadingScreenHint4_Universal: I be more likely t' believe thar be penguins at th' North pole, than SDA informatics has spent money on Neptun servers...
api_loadingScreenHint5_Universal: Neptun servers be so reliable, I would do me bankin' on 'em...
api_loadingScreenHint6_Universal: SDA meanin': Sok Dagadt Analfabéta, aka: Many Fat Analfabetics. They couldn't create a usable mobile app...
api_loadingScreenHint7_Universal: I would bet me house on that ye be still readin' this because it be still loadin'...
api_loadingScreenHintMini2_Universal: Hold up! It can't do it that fast...
api_loadingScreenHintMini3_Universal: Forgot what ye just read? Try takin' B6 vitamins!...
popup_case1_settingOption1_FamilyFriendl: If ye turn this on, loadin' texts will become outspoken ones.
popup_case1_settingOption2_ExamNotificat: Exam notifications will send ye notifications in th' span o' 2 weeks beforehand. It be useful if ye like procrastinatin' studyin', or ye tend t' forget.
popup_case1_settingOption3_ClassNotifica: It will send ye notifications 10 minutes; 5 minutes; and at th' start o' th' class, so ye won't miss 'em. Useful if ye want t' know what class ye be goin' t' have beforehand, without th' need t' check on yer phone (ex: Ye have a smartwatch)
popup_case1_settingOption4_PaymentNotifi: If ye have payments due, th' app will be notifyin' ye every day, until they be paid. Useful if ye tend t' forget, or just don't want t' miss a due date.
popup_case1_settingOption5_PeriodsNotifi: If a new period be about t' become active, th' app will notify ye, 1 day before th' given period, and th' day when they be active. Useful if ye don't want t' miss somethin' important tied t' periods. (ex: class registration period)
popup_case1_settingOption6_AppHapticsDes: Ye can set if ye want th' app t' give ye haptic feedback. (Vibrate)
popup_case1_settingOption7_WeekOffsetDes: If ye have issues wit' th' current study week, ye can offset it t' th' correct week!
popup_case2_RateAppPopupDescription:
Do ye like th' app? Do ye hate it? Rate it on Google Play!
It takes about 10 seconds, and it gives me, and other users feedback.
popup_case6_AccountError: 🤷 Thar be an issue wit' yer account 🤷
popup_case6_AccountErrorDescription:
It seems like we can't fetch data from yer Neptun.
Please log out, and log right back in.
popup_case1_settingOption8_LangaugeSelec: Choose what language th' app shall speak t' ye.
popup_case7_ObsolteAppVersionDescription:
This version o' th' app be outdated.
Please consider updatin' th' app fer th' best user experience! 😌
